com.verymuchme.appconfig

Class ConfigurationDefinitionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.verymuchme.appconfig.ConfigurationDefinitionBuilder

  • public class ConfigurationDefinitionBuilder
extends Object
    Dynamically build a configuration definition compatible with Apache Commons Configuration See the documentation in AppConfig for details.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tracy Flynn

        public boolean loadLog4jConfiguration(List<String> configNames)
                               throws Exception
        Load log4j configuration - first file in the list that exists is loaded
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if configuration found and loaded, false otherwise
